__TOC__

This is the organisation site for the kubuntu booth at the LinuxTag2006.
kubuntu have a booth with ubuntu community and edubuntu.

The coordination is being taken care of by julius bloch. email juliux '''at''' ubuntu '''minus'''de '''dot''' de and Torsten Rahn <rahn@kde.org>.

See KubuntuLinuxTagMeetings
